attributes.action: Abandon the current EU Treaty ratification process in parliament and call the referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the decision of the Irish electorate, and in order for the Prime Minister to truly represent British opinion at future EU meetings, the current ratification process should be abandoned and the Treaty details placed before the British electorate in a referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
